meanings.definition: A shrub or small tree of the barberry family, with spiny leaves and yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The berberises in the garden have sharp thorns to protect themselves.
meanings.sent2: I planted a beautiful berberises bush in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to climb the berberises but got pricked by its thorns.
meanings.sent4: The berberises stood tall in the garden, a fortress of green with its spiky armor.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow flowers of the berberises lit up the whole yard.

meanings.definition: The red or purple berries of the berberis plant, used in cooking and medicine.
meanings.sent1: The chef used fresh berberises to make a delicious sauce.
meanings.sent2: I picked some ripe berberises to add to my morning smoothie.
meanings.sent3: The potion called for a handful of berberises to work its magic.
meanings.sent4: The berberises looked like precious gems hanging from the branches.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooking berberises filled the kitchen with warmth.
